item.title: Beyond the Code: My Journey in 2023
item.description: Now that the current year 2023 is coming to an end I think it would be appropriate to make a small comment about my experience this year and my new wishes for next year. Professional Milestones Professionally I have been able to work on two different projects within the company where I am working, and thanks to this I have been able to acquire knowledge about many technologies that until then were only known to me in theory.
